title: Darksiders II RePack By R.G Mechanics NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
Year of release : 2012
Genre : Action (Slasher) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Vigil Games
Publisher : THQ | Buka Entertainment

Language : ENG|RUS

System requirements:
Operating system : Windows XP / Vista / 7
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz or AMD equivalent production
Memory : 2 GB
Video Card : 256 MB VRAM
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard drive : 6 GB

Description :
Darksiders 2 - continuation of the action Darksiders: Wrath of War from the studio Vigil Games, the effect of which will unfold simultaneously with the events of the first part. The protagonist of Darksiders 2 is one of the horsemen of the Apocalypse, Death, who is trying to help find the culprit in the War of the premature end of the world. Players will be able to explore new areas, to seek the secret rooms and solving puzzles, and fight with new monsters and various bosses, using a variety of skills and abilities.
